department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: Marine engineering services for Department of Fisheries and Oceans (DFO) with the Government of Canada
description: Standing Offer for Coastal Harbour Engineering Services for DFO.
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement - Coastal Harbour Engineering Services

## Title

- English: **Request for Standing Offer (RFSO)**: F1571-230332 - Coastal Harbour Engineering Services
- French: **Demande d’offre à commandes (DOC)**: F1571-230332 - Services d’ingénierie côtière et portuaire

## Public Notice Details

- Public Notice Number: WS4409133854
- Solicitation Number: WS4409133854
- Publication Date: January 24, 2024
- Tender Closing Date: April 12, 2024 (14:00:00)
- Amendment Date: March 14, 2024

## Service Description

We are seeking proposals for Standing Offers (SOs) for Coastal Harbour Engineering Services. The Service includes:

- Marine engineering services
- Planning and design services for coastal and harbour projects
- Inspections and remediation services for harbour structures

## Important Information

- Tender Status: Expired
- Expected Contract Start Date: April 1, 2024
- Expected Contract End Date: None fixed ( term contract with periodic renewals )
- Procurement Category: Service
- Contracting Entity: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)

## Contract Award Criteria

- The contract will be awarded based on a Combined Rating of Technical Merit (40%) and Price (60%)

## Interested Parties

- Canadian companies and businesses are invited to participate in this procurement. 
- Relevant trade agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
- Regions of opportunity: British Columbia, Canada

## About the Contracting Entity

- Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) 
- Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec K1A0S5, Canada
- Contact: Simon Leung (SPAC/PSPC) - <simon.leung@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca>

## Additional Information

- This contract will be awarded using a term contract with periodic renewals.
- The contract term: not defined in this notice
- Businesses can review a copy of the Request for Standing Offer (RFSO) document on LineUp Procurement: <https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18610534>
